game.name: Dark Podval
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dark Podval - platformer where you have to go through the basement mazes, solve puzzlesand avoid deadly traps. Can you get out of there alive and take all the coins?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dark Podval - platformer where you have to go through the basement mazes, solve puzzlesand avoid deadly traps. Can you get out of there alive and take all the coins?

reviewHighlights.text: this game has done tragedies for me, and ruined my marriage. you OWE me dark podval... you owe me...
